channel.title: Nextflow on Living Systems
channel.description: Recent content in Nextflow on Living Systems

item.title: Troubleshooting Nextflow pipelines
item.description: We have been evaluating Nextflow before in my work at pharmb.io , but that was before DSL2 and the support for re-usable modules (which was one reason we needed to develop our own tools to support our challenges, as explained in the paper ). Thus, there’s definitely some stuff to get into. Based on my years in bioinformatics and data science, I’ve seen that the number one skill that you need to develop is to be able to effectively troubleshoot things, because things will invariably fail in all kinds of ways.
